pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulation and Estimation of Log-GARCH Models // Simulation and estimation of univariate and multivariate log-GARCH models. The main functions of the package are: lgarchSim(), mlgarchSim(), lgarch() and mlgarch(). The first two functions simulate from a univariate and a multivariate log-GARCH model, respectively, whereas the latter two estimate a univariate and multivariate log-GARCH model, respectively.
